@Mothman1979 well actually...Bat wings are just very large hands+fingers...Bats literally fly through the power of Jazz Hands, so it's not odd that she could use a controller, since their gripping finger is in fact the Thumb equivalent on a human. That said, the artist kinda skimped on the anatomy details, her wings would be fanned out in front of her if she was using the first or second finger of them to squeeze the triggers, not to the side of her legs.
...then again I think the "fingers" in the wings have joints on bats too, I dun fuggin know, its fictional anatomy.
